World News | Latest Top Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/ Reuters.com is your online source for the latest world news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub) RS集线器i@diygod.me (DIYgod) zh-cn https://www.reuters.com/pf/resources/images/reuters/logo-vertical-default-512x512.png?d=116World News | Latest Top Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/ 2024 年 2 月 19 日星期一 19:26:18 GMT 120
Israel assembly falls short in vote to expel lawmaker over genocide caseLawmakers from Israel's religious-nationalist coalition failed on Monday to gain enough votes in parliament to expel a far-left colleague over his support for an International Court of Justice (ICJ) case accusing the country of genocide in Gaza. Mon, 19 Feb 2024 19:24:56 GMT QQ2MABI6VJLIDEYX77FGKAOKUU https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israel- assembly-falls-short-vote-expel-lawmaker-over-genocide-case-2024-02-19/Reuters世界中东
Russian pilot who defected to Ukraine shot dead in Spain -reportsA Russian pilot who defected to Ukraine with his helicopter last year was found dead in an underground garage in Spain last week, his body riddled with bullets, Ukrainian and Spanish media reported on Monday. Mon, 19 Feb 2024 19:23:52 GMT 6YHPPAN7FBNMPDIXK2EDLMJTDI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russian-pilot-who-defected-ukraine-shot-dead-spain-reports-2024-02-19/Reuters世界欧洲
Guinea junta temporarily dissolves government, presidency saysGuinea's self-appointed military leaders have dissolved the government and will appoint a new one, the presidency's secretary general said in a filmed statement on Monday. Mon, 19 Feb 2024 19:20:29 GMT 3HBZFN34QJKLTD3W7HDKHCI26A https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/guinea-junta-temporarily-dissolves-government-presidency-says-2024-02-19/Reuters世界非洲
Sixteen Haitian family members found dead at home, cause unknownSixteen people from the same family were found dead in a remote mountain town in southern Haiti, a local official said on Monday, with local news outlets noting the deaths were reported a day after the family attended a funeral. Mon, 19 Feb 2024 18:27:09 GMT OUJHTHKNINOVFOE54KXLPQAWHE https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/sixteen-haitian-family-members-found-dead-home-cause-unknown-2024-02-19/Reuters世界美洲
EU launches naval mission to protect Red Sea shippingThe European Union launched on Monday a naval mission to the Red Sea "to restore and safeguard freedom of navigation" there. Mon, 19 Feb 2024 18:08:28 GMT 4EYGFDXYIVKOFJI26RJQAAIFZI https://www.reuters.com/world/eu-launches-naval-mission-protect-red-sea-shipping-2024-02-19/Reuters世界
Israeli military says it has recovered footage of hostage mother and childrenThe Israeli military released footage on Monday which it said showed Israeli woman Shiri Bibas and her two small children being moved by Palestinian militants in Gaza shortly after the family was kidnapped in southern Israel on Oct. 7. Mon, 19 Feb 2024 17:43:32 GMT 2JS6XTOYBBLEDJ6JSMJUO2LHKQ https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israeli-military-says-it-has-recovered-footage-hostage-mother-children-2024-02-19/Reuters世界中东
Exclusive: IAEA chief says Iran's nuclear enrichment activity remains highIran continues to enrich uranium well beyond the needs for commercial nuclear use despite U.N. pressure to stop it, IAEA chief Rafael Grossi said on Monday, adding he wanted to visit Tehran next month for the first time in a year to end the "drifting apart". Mon, 19 Feb 2024 17:40:26 GMT MOQGZREMENLF5OFRZGSED4BU5Y https://www.reuters.com/world/iaea-chief-says-irans-nuclear-enrichment-activity-remains-high-2024-02-19/Julia Payne世界
Brazil's Lula recalls ambassador in Israel for talks -sourceBrazilian President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva has recalled his ambassador to Israel for talks, a source in Brazil's foreign ministry said on Monday, as a diplomatic scuffle plays out over the president's recent comments about Israel's war in Gaza. Mon, 19 Feb 2024 17:30:50 GMT 5EZ7ALXSMJKP3E5OWU6I4QM5AQ https://www.reuters.com/world/brazil-president-recalls-ambassador-israel-talks-local-media-2024-02-19/Reuters世界
Yulia Navalnaya, Russia's steely new opposition politician out to avenge husband's deathBefore the shock death of her husband Alexei in a grim Arctic prison last week, Yulia Navalnaya had always played down the idea she would one day take over as leader of Russia's opposition. But on Monday, she vowed to continue his fight. Mon, 19 Feb 2024 16:58:36 GMT R6YR3OFCXNJ6JMKSPPCBLZZ4ETI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/yulia-navalnaya- Russias-steely-new-opposition-politician-out-avenge-husbands-2024-02-19/Andrew Osborn世界欧洲
US proposes UN Security Council oppose Rafah assault, back temporary Gaza ceasefireThe United States has proposed an alternative draft United Nations Security Council resolution calling for a temporary ceasefire in the Israel-Hamas war and opposing a major Israeli ground offensive in Rafah in southern Gaza, according to the text seen by Reuters on Monday. Mon, 19 Feb 2024 16:39:24 GMT TYEFNFWZNJLSHPKQ5IQKKZILOI https://www.reuters.com/world/us-proposes-un-resolution-supporting-temporary-ceasefire-gaza-2024-02-19/Michelle Nichols世界
After retreat, Ukraine digs in to repel new Russian attacks in eastUkraine's military said on Monday its troops had taken up new defensive positions in the east after retreating from the captured town of Avdiivka and were repelling Russian attempts to develop the offensive thrust. Mon, 19 Feb 2024 16:02:03 GMT NSCSLVCK75OEJDAUD7MH3RQJ2Y https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/after-retreat-ukraine-digs-repel-new- Russian-attacks-east-2024-02-19/Pavel Polityuk, Tom Balmforth世界欧洲
